examples.title: Loading State
examples.description: Show async operations in progress with spinner
examples.code:
<template>
  <InButtonV2
    id="save-btn"
    type="primary"
    label-text="Save"
    :loading-status="isLoading"
    @click="handleSave"
  />
</template>

<script setup>
import { ref } from 'vue';

const isLoading = ref(false);

const handleSave = async () => {
  isLoading.value = true;
  try {
    await api.save();
  } finally {
    isLoading.value = false;
  }
};
</script>
